ygData.msgSnippet: Razor Claw was bewildered by the prospect that the leader was looking for advice. Whatever you command is our task to perform. Lunarpine laughed. Don t look

Razor Claw was bewildered by the prospect that the leader was looking 
for advice. "Whatever you command is our task to perform."

Lunarpine laughed. "Don't look at me. You're in charge. Hewas hopeing 
she'd take charge and instruct them, instead she'd dropped the ball. 
He thought to her, "Take charge, you have to be strong in front of 
your troops." He knew her well enough to tell that it was just nerves 
that held her back. Razor Claw didn't know her as well and the 
Predacons frown upon a leader that has to ask for advice.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She had a blank expression on her face as Lunarpine asked the 
> question. "Ah, well, I don't really know for sure. Erh, any ideas?"
> 
> She still wasn't thinking like a leader yet.  She was feeling more 
> nervouse than anything.  She kept hoping she wouldn't make 
mistakes, 
> but somehow, she felt like she was already making them.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Razor Claw sat up straight as Ice adressed him. "You have been 
> placed as my
> > commanding officer, your rank alone influences me to trust you 
with 
> my
> > spark." He was flattered that she'd allow him to adress her by 
her 
> name but
> > under the circumstances he found protocall easier to follow. His 
> Raptor
> > influence said to gobble up the first small animal to cross his 
> path, but
> > his bot intuition told him that wouldn't be a good first 
impression 
> for the
> > meeting.
> > 
> > Lunarpine understood the warriors protocall it was that way 
through 
> every
> > war that had ever occured or will occur as the case was. "Well 
I've 
> gotta
> > agree with the luizard on half of that." he lowered himself in 
the 
> seat in a
> > pose that a Predacon would have found disrespectfull. "You are in 
> command so
> > what are we to do when we get there?"
